CreditCardTransaction.title: CreditCardTransaction
CreditCardTransaction.description: Represents a single credit card transaction.

transactionDate.description: The date when the transaction occurred.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this transaction.

DepositAccountTransaction.title: DepositAccountTransaction
DepositAccountTransaction.description: Represents a single deposit account transaction.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DepositAccountTransaction entity.

transactionDate.description: The date when the transaction occurred.

transactionTime.description: The time when the transaction occurred.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction (positive for withdrawal, negative for deposit).

counterpartyBankCode.description: The bank code of the counterparty (if applicable).

counterpartyAccountNumber.description: The account number of the counterparty (if applicable).

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category for classifying transactions (e.g., Food, Travel, Utilities).

id.description: Unique identifier for the Category entity.

/users/{userId}/credit_card_transactions.description: Stores credit card transaction data for each user. Each document represents a single transaction. The transaction is owned by the user identified by {userId}.

/users/{userId}/deposit_account_transact.description: Stores deposit account transaction data for each user. Each document represents a single transaction. The transaction is owned by the user identified by {userId}.

/users/{userId}/categories/{categoryId}.description: Stores categories for each user. Each document represents a category that the user can assign to transactions. The category is owned by the user identified by {userId}.
